snippet: Fosun International said that its chairman, Guo Guangchang, the company’s founder and one of China’s best-known entrepreneurs, was assisting authorities with an investigation.
abstract: Fosun International says its chairman and founder Guo Guangchang is helping authorities with investigation dispelling report that company had lost contact with him.
lead_paragraph: Fosun International said that its chairman, Guo Guangchang, the company’s founder and one of China’s best-known entrepreneurs, was assisting authorities with an investigation.

headline.main: Fosun Says Missing Chief Is Aiding Chinese Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Fosun Says Missing Chief Is Aiding Chinese Inquiry
